name: Spot the impostor
description:
/!\ Epilepsy warning : may cause eye trouble (or brain damage ) because of flashy color /!\

Goal is simple : 

There is 2 modes for the moment : 

Infinite :   inside a sea of pixel is hidden an amongus  : 
you have to find it and click it ! (he can be in different color !)

Level : same as infinite but the number of pixel will grow while you find the impostor !

Controls : 

Mouse

Escape to force close (in menu only)

Space to give up  (it will show the position of the impostor)

Please be gentle it's my first "real" game haha if you have any idea or bug found please comment !
